description: Murugaiya Chandramogan    Vs   Hon. Attorney General before Hon. Amal Ranaraja, J.
parties: Murugaiya Chandramogan    Vs   Hon. Attorney General
keywords: Evidence – Non-summary inquiry – Cross-examination of the prosecution witness - Admission of contents of a deposition given by witnesses in a non-summary inquiry - Guidelines in evaluation of a dock statement.
legistation: - Sections 296 and 380 of the Penal Code - Section 6 of the Code of Criminal Procedure (Special Provisions) Act No. 42 of 2007 - Chapter XI and XV of the Code of Criminal Procedure Act No.15 of 1979 - Section 33 of the Evidence Ordinance No. 14 of 1895
